description: PRIOR APPROVAL FOR CHANGE OF USE FROM OFFICE SPACE (CLASS B1a) TO RESIDENTIAL (CLASS C3) FOR THE CREATION OF 13 SELF CONTAINED FLATS.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed development is not permitted by Schedule 2, Part 3, Class O of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended). This is because the building was not solely in a use falling within Class B1(a) (offices) on 29 May 2013, or if the building was not in use on that date, when it was last in use.

Reason : 2 - INFORMATIVE

The submitted plans/ documents in which prior approval has been refused is as follows: 
02; 03; 04; 05; 06; 07; 08; 09; 11; 12; 13; 14; 15; 16; 17; 18; PROPOSED SITE PLAN; LOCATION PLAN; TRANSPORT STATEMENT; WASTE MANAGEMNT STATEMENT; PHASE 1 ENVIRONMENTAL REPORT; FLOOD RISK ASSESSMENT; GROUNDSURE REPORT; NOISE IMPACT ASSESSMENT.

Note to Applicant
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton  (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:
"	Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
"	Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
"	As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.
In this instance:
"	The application was not considered to comply with the provisions of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended) 
"	It is noted that the applicant/agent did not engage in any pre-application discussions.
"	The applicant is advised to seek pre-application advice on any resubmission.
